category: Jury Committee Regulations/Article 8 (Term of office of members)
contents: Article 8 (Term of office of members) ① The term of office of members shall be two years, but shall not be based on the number of days but shall be based on the regular general meeting of the Sports Association. In this case, the expiration date of the term is the day before the regular general meeting. Revised 2019. 1. 31. ② The term of office of the by-elected member shall be the remaining term of the predecessor. [Title revised 2021. 12. 27.]
